  • Field Details

    • material

      private String material
      The material which the toy animal is made out of. Common materials include wood, plastic, or fabric.

    • size

      private String size
      The size of the toy animal, which may be small, medium, or large.

  • Constructor Details

    • Animal

      public Animal(String serialNumber, String name, String brand, double price, int availableCount, int appropriateAge, String material, String size)
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number to associate with the animal.
      name - The name to associate with the animal.
      brand - The brand name (manufacturer) to associate with the animal.
      price - The cost of the animal in dollars and cents.
      availableCount - The number of this animal in inventory.
      appropriateAge - The minimum recommended age for this animal.
      material - A text description of the animal's fabrication material.
      size - The size of the animal.

    • Animal

      public Animal(String[] fields)
      Create an animal from a string array. Wraps the more complex constructor.
      Parameters:
      fields - The record from the on-disk "database" to create an animal from.

    • Animal

      public Animal()
      A constructor used to create a place-holding animal, which avoids initializing the currentToy with null.

  • Method Details

    • getSize

      public String getSize()
      Acquire the size of the animal.
      Returns:
      the size (small, medium, large, etc.) of the animal.

    • getMaterial

      public String getMaterial()
      Acquire the material the animal is made out of.
      Returns:
      the text description of the material (such as wood, or fabric) the animal is made from.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Description copied from class: Toy
      The toString method of all toys, providing a drier way to format each object for saving to disk. Ends with a semicolon so each toy type can merely append the next item.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Toy
      Returns:
      the string format of the puzzle suitable for logic purposes

    • format

      public String format()
      Description copied from class: Toy
      Ensure that each subclass implements a format method to call the super.toString() method and append the subclass-specific information for saving to disk.
      Specified by:
      format in class Toy
      Returns:
      the string format of the puzzle suitable for on-disk storage
